dcterms:creator: J. Xu
T. Mei
T. Yao
Y. Rui
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of 1,970 short video clips collected from YouTube, with an average length of about 9s. It contains about 80,000 clip-description pairs labeled by Amazon Mechanical Turkers (AMT), with each clip having multiple sentence descriptions.
dcterms:title: MSVD

dcterms:creator: J. Xu
T. Mei
T. Yao
Y. Rui
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 10K web video clips and 200K clip-sentence pairs in total. Each clip is annotated with 20 natural sentences by 1,327 AMT workers, providing a large-scale benchmark for video understanding.
dcterms:title: MSR-VTT
